sentences.en: Apart from a small team of paid staff, the organisation consists of unpaid volunteers.
sentences.cn: 除了一小组受薪员工外，这个组织里都是不领报酬的志愿者。

sentences.en: He gamely defended his organisation's decision.
sentences.cn: 他极力为其组织的决定辩解。

sentences.en: He gave money to the World Health Organisation to help defeat smallpox.
sentences.cn: 他向世界卫生组织提供资金以帮助消灭天花。

sentences.en: He has been charged with membership of an illegal organisation.
sentences.cn: 他被指控参与非法组织。

sentences.en: He was expected to make a very positive contribution to the 1996 Games organisation.
sentences.cn: 人们期待他为1996年奥运会的组织做出积极的贡献。

sentences.en: His application for membership of the organisation was rejected.
sentences.cn: 他想要加入该组织的申请遭到了拒绝。

sentences.en: My grumble is with the structure and organisation of the material.
sentences.cn: 我所不满的是素材的结构和组织。

sentences.en: Organisation is the strength of any good army.
sentences.cn: 任何优良部队都是很有组织纪律性的。

sentences.en: Please describe the goals your organisation is hoping to achieve through this partnership as well as any recognition you hope to receive for your partnership with the UN.
sentences.cn: 请描述您的组织希望通过这个合作关系实现的目标，以及您希望从与联合国的合作关系得到的任何认可。

sentences.en: Several projects have been delayed by poor organisation.
sentences.cn: 几个项目都因组织不力而被推迟。

sentences.en: The Farmers' Club is an organisation for people involved in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 农场主俱乐部是为农业界人士创办的组织。

sentences.en: The organisation has had its ups and downs.
sentences.cn: 该机构经历过兴衰沉浮。

sentences.en: The organisation would be in touch with him tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 该组织明天就会和他联络。

sentences.en: The plans were drawn up in consultation with the World Health Organisation.
sentences.cn: 这些方案是在与世界卫生组织磋商之后起草的。

sentences.en: The prospect of change of this kind has an unsettling effect on any organisation.
sentences.cn: 这种变化的前景对任何组织都有不确定的影响。

sentences.en: They voted to accept a deal whereby the union will receive nearly three-quarters of a million pounds from the International Miners Organisation.
sentences.cn: 他们表决同意了一项协议，根据这一协议工会将从国际矿工组织得到近75万英镑。
